text: 49th Street is a station on the BMT Broadway Line of the New York City Subway. It can be found at the intersection of 49th Street and 7th Avenue in Midtown Manhattan. It is served by the N, Q, R and W trains. Behind the station is Times Square. After this station on the Broadway Line, the next stations will be 57th Street Seventh Avenue and Times Square 42nd Street. ==References== Category:New York City Subway stations
title: 49th Street station (BMT Broadway Line)
